class.name: System.Diagnostics.TraceSwitch
class.summary: Multi-level switch to provide tracing and debug output without recompiling.

property.name: Level
property.summary: Gets or sets the trace level that specifies the messages to output for tracing and debugging.

property.name: TraceError
property.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the Level is set to Error, Warning, Info, or Verbose.

property.name: TraceInfo
property.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the Level is set to Info or Verbose.

property.name: TraceVerbose
property.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the Level is set to Verbose.

property.name: TraceWarning
property.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the Level is set to Warning, Info, or Verbose.
